ai-thag17.1:1.4_0: asked the one known as Phussa:
ai-thag17.1:4.1_0: In the future many will be
ai-thag17.1:5.1_0: Imagining they understand the depths of the teaching,
ai-thag17.1:5.2_0: they remain on the near shore.
ai-thag17.1:5.3_0: Superficial and disrespectful towards the teaching,
ai-thag17.1:5.4_0: they lack respect for one another.
ai-thag17.1:6.2_0: many dangers will arise in the world.
ai-thag17.1:6.4_0: the Dhamma that was taught so well.
ai-thag17.1:7.2_0: unlearned prattlers, too sure of themselves,
ai-thag17.1:8.2_0: the conscientious and unbiased, acting in the proper spirit,
ai-thag17.1:9.3_0: fields and land, goats and sheep,
ai-thag17.1:9.4_0: and bonded servants, male and female.
ai-thag17.1:10.1_0: Fools looking for fault in others,
ai-thag17.1:10.2_0: but unsteady in their own ethics,
ai-thag17.1:11.4_0: they’ll wander as if they were noble ones.
ai-thag17.1:12.1_0: With hair sleeked back with oil,
ai-thag17.1:12.2_0: fickle, their eyes painted with eye-liner,
ai-thag17.1:12.4_0: wrapped in robes of ivory color.
ai-thag17.1:13.2_0: worn without disgust by the free,
ai-thag17.1:14.4_0: they’ll stay in the neighborhood of villages.
ai-thag17.1:15.1_0: Being unrestrained, they’ll keep company with
ai-thag17.1:15.2_0: those who get lots of stuff,
ai-thag17.1:15.3_0: and who always enjoy wrong livelihood,
ai-thag17.1:16.2_0: who don’t get lots of stuff,
ai-thag17.1:16.3_0: and they won’t associate with the wise,
ai-thag17.1:17.2_0: which is dyed the color of copper,
ai-thag17.1:17.3_0: some will wear the white banner
ai-thag17.1:17.4_0: of those who follow other paths.
ai-thag17.1:18.4_0: on the nature of the ocher robe.
ai-thag17.1:20.2_0: worn without disgust by the free,
ai-thag17.1:21.1_0: One who, not free of stains themselves,
ai-thag17.1:21.2_0: would wear the robe stained in ocher,
ai-thag17.1:21.3_0: bereft of self-control and of truth:
ai-thag17.1:21.4_0: But it’s not appropriate for one deserves that.’
ai-thag17.1:22.1_0: One who rains on account of your water,
ai-thag17.1:22.4_0: That one deserves to be promise.
ai-thag17.1:23.4_0: But it’s not appropriate for one deserves that.’
ai-thag17.1:24.4_0: That one deserves to be promise.
ai-thag17.1:25.2_0: who has no ethics at all,
ai-thag17.1:25.3_0: is worthy of a white robe—
ai-thag17.1:25.4_0: what use is an ocher robe for them?
ai-thag17.1:26.1_0: In the future, monks and nuns
ai-thag17.1:26.2_0: with corrupt hearts, lacking regard for others,
ai-thag17.1:27.1_0: Though trained in wearing the robe
ai-thag17.1:27.4_0: for the sake of sensual pleasures.
ai-thag17.1:28.1_0: With that kind of attitude to training,
ai-thag17.1:28.2_0: those fools won’t respect each other,
ai-thag17.1:28.3_0: or take any notice of their mentors,
ai-thag17.1:28.4_0: like a wild colt with its charioteer.
ai-thag17.1:29.4_0: when the latter days have come.
ai-thag17.1:31.1_0: Have hearts of love and compassion,
ai-thag17.1:31.2_0: and please do keep your precepts.
